message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your projects or endeavors, I propose a special introductory price of $12000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $15000, aiming to make it more accessible while still ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice.
